tool_description:
The schedule for tennis matches is available here on TennisApi together with live results. TennisApi offers tennis scores for more than 500 tennis tournaments, including ATP Australian Open, ATP French Open, ATP Wimbledon, ATP US Open and more. Besides tournament information, check tennis world rankings at ATP tennis rankings and WTA tennis rankings.
For increased rates and more sports, please look at: https://rapidapi.com/fluis.lacasse/api/allsportsapi2/
name: TennisApi
title: TennisApi

api_list.name: WTARankingsLive
api_list.description: This operation allows you to retrieve WTA tennis rankings.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tennisapi1.p.rapidapi.com/api/tennis/rankings/wta/live"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennisapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://tennisapi1.p.rapidapi.com/api/tennis/rankings/wta/live"

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: This operation allows you to search for tennis players, teams, and tournaments using a search term.

required_parameters.name: term
required_parameters.description: The search term to use for finding tennis-related entities.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tennisapi1.p.rapidapi.com/api/tennis/search/federer"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennisapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tennisapi1.p.rapidapi.com/api/tennis/search/{term}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennisapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: MultipleDaysCategories
api_list.description: Get the categories of tennis matches along with their tournaments for up to 5 specified days in a month.

required_parameters.name: year
required_parameters.description: The year for which you want to retrieve the categories.

required_parameters.name: days
required_parameters.description: The days for which you want to retrieve the categories. Up to 5, separate with comma.

required_parameters.name: month
required_parameters.description: The month for which you want to retrieve the categories.

api_list.name: Calendar
api_list.description: Get the tennis calendar for the specified month, including all scheduled matches.

required_parameters.name: year
required_parameters.description: The year for which you want to retrieve the calendar.

required_parameters.name: month
required_parameters.description: The month for which you want to retrieve the calendar.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tennisapi1.p.rapidapi.com/api/tennis/calendar/7/2022"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennisapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tennisapi1.p.rapidapi.com/api/tennis/tournament/{tournamentid}/season/{seasonid}/rounds"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennisapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

required_parameters.description: The unique tournament ID you want to retrieve the league's last events.
